reviews.review: this game is fun and good for aim training or if you have a itch for a high skill cap shooter. but i would recommend buying premium cause there are quite a few cheaters in the free version.
best game of all time for the worst players in the world

Showing its age but still really fun!

One of the Best Fps games of all time , nothing really compares to it but like every other game it has some flaws to it aswell. I got this game way back when it was not a free to play and had to buy it , back then since it cost money to play it , no one really had the guts to cheat or hack on the game since if you get caught you'd be permantly banned and all you in game purchases gone as well for the game. But now since its F2P, there are hackers or cheaters in almost every game. Hell i cant even rank up anymore, i win 3 games in a row and then the next game a blatant cheater shows up trash talking and tapping everyone to death FFS valve. Aside all this bs i totally recommend the game
